duties_responsibilities.duty: Instructing subordinate co-workers and scheduling and conducting fire safety programs and activities.
Demonstrating fire safety techniques and preparing reports and maintaining records.
Processing paperwork and providing guidance and training to lower-level employees.
Designing art materials, puppet stage, theater, robots, and puppetry for school children to be used in conjunction with fire safety programs.
Conducting special events and fire safety seminars in conjunction with other organizations, and greeting and advising various groups on fire and life safety issues and techniques.
